newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tokyo stocks almost flat in early morning trade.
newsitem.headline: Tokyo stocks almost flat in early morning trade.

text.p: Tokyo stocks were almost flat in early morning trade on Thursday, with market participants remaining on the sidelines ahead of Japan's general elections on Sunday, brokers said.
They expected the market's key Nikkei average to drift in a narrow range until the elections.

About five minutes after the start of the session, the 225-share Nikkei average was down 6.69 points, or 0.03 percent, at 21,390.50. In the futures market, the key December futures contract was unchanged at 21,430.
"Selling pressure increases when the Nikkei average moves closer to 21,500," said a senior broker at a second-tier Japanese securities house.
